tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE referees (    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    name VARCHAR(255),    certification VARCHAR(100) );
CREATE TABLE certifications (    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    certification_name VARCHAR(100),    valid_from DATE,    valid_to DATE );
CREATE TABLE match_assignments (    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    referee_id UUID,    match_id UUID,    assignment_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE matches (    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    match_date DATE,    location VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE referee_contacts (    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,    referee_id UUID,    email VARCHAR(255),    phone_number VARCHAR(15) );
